name: The Inbetween
description:
The Inbetween is a 2D platform Horror/Adventure game. 

Play as Yukko, a small girl who has become lost on her journey home through the woods and stumbled into the Inbetween (a place where otherworldly beings walk the earth). 

Help Yukko find her way home while hiding from hungry spirits, collecting wisps, and exploring the world around you. 

Controls: 

  • Left and Right - Directional Keys 
  • Jump / Prompted - Space Bar 
  • Throw - G
